# beget_configuration_group (Data Source)

Retrieve details of a single CPU family group (e.g., high_cpu, normal_cpu) by group identifier.

## Fields
- `id`: group identifier (same as `group` input)
- `name`: human-readable group name

## Example Usage
```terraform
# Retrieve CPU family group details
data "beget_configuration_group" "high_cpu" {
  group = "high_cpu"
}

output "high_cpu_group" {
  value = {
    id   = data.beget_configuration_group.high_cpu.id
    name = data.beget_configuration_group.high_cpu.name
  }
}
```
<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `group` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `name` (String)
